transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .guide_wrap{padding:30px 0}.guide_wrap section{margin:0 20px}.guide_wrap section+section{border-top:1px dashed #ababab;margin-top:30px;padding-top:30px}.guide_wrap section h2{display:flex;font-size:24px;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:20px;padding:10px 10px 10px 20px;position:relative}.guide_wrap section h2:before{border-left:5px solid #ff7200;content:"";height:15px;left:0;position:absolute;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%)}.guide_wrap section h2 ul{display:inline-flex;margin-left:auto}.guide_wrap section h2 ul li{align-items:center;display:flex}.guide_wrap section h2 ul li a{color:#222;display:block;font-size:14px;padding:0 15px;text-decoration:none}.guide_wrap section .explain{margin-bottom:20px}.guide_wrap section .explain li{padding-left:12px;position:relative}.guide_wrap section .explain li+li{margin-top:15px}.guide_wrap section .explain li:before{bottom:0;content:"-";display:block;left:0;position:absolute;top:0}.guide_wrap section .explain li strong{display:block;margin-bottom:8px}.guide_wrap section .toolbar{background-color:#eee;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}.guide_wrap section .toolbar li{padding:8px}.guide_wrap section .toolbar li>*{border-radius:4px;display:block;padding:8px;transition:background .25s}.guide_wrap section .toolbar li>:hover{background-color:#ddd}.guide_wrap section .toolbar li>.current{background-color:#ccc}.guide_wrap section h3{margin-bottom:10px;margin-top:20px}.design_box{border:1px solid #eee;padding:15px}.code_box{background-color:#000;border:10px solid #f2f2f2;color:#fff;line-height:1.8;overflow:auto;padding:15px}
